mapper.sql:
FROM tradItem a LEFT JOIN tradAuthor b ON b.tditSeq = a.tditSeq LEFT JOIN infrAuthorCode c ON c.ifacSeq = b.tdatSeq LEFT JOIN infrPublisherCode d ON d.ifpcSeq = a.tditPublisherCd WHERE 1=1 AND b.tdatDefaultNy = 1
AND tditDelNy = 1 AND tditDelNy = 0
AND tditTitle LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') AND c.ifacName LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%') AND d.ifpcName LIKE concat('%', #{shValue}, '%')
AND a.tditPublishingDate BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
mapper.select: SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditPublisherCd ,a.tditPublishingDate ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditDelNy ,b.path ,b.uuidName ,b.pseq ,b.type FROM tradItem a LEFT JOIN tradItemUploaded b ON b.pseq= a.tditSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.tditItemCate = 2 ORDER BY a.tditPublishingDate DESC limit 4

SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditPublisherCd ,a.tditPublishingDate ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditDelNy ,b.path ,b.uuidName ,b.pseq ,b.type FROM tradItem a LEFT JOIN tradItemUploaded b ON b.pseq= a.tditSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.tditItemCate = 3 ORDER BY a.tditPublishingDate DESC limit 4

SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditPublisherCd ,a.tditPublishingDate ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditDelNy ,a.modDateTime ,a.modDateTimeSvr ,a.regDateTime ,a.regDateTimeSvr ,b.path ,b.uuidName ,b.pseq ,b.type FROM tradItem a LEFT JOIN tradItemUploaded b ON b.pseq= a.tditSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.tditItemCate = 4 ORDER BY a.tditPublishingDate DESC limit 4

SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditDelNy ,b.tdatAuthorCd ,b.tdatDefaultNy ,c.path ,c.uuidName ,c.pseq ,c.type FROM tradItem a LEFT JOIN tradAuthor b ON b.tditSeq = a.tditSeq LEFT JOIN tradItemUploaded c ON c.pseq= a.tditSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.tdatDefaultNy = 1 AND a.tditSeq BETWEEN 3 AND 10

SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,b.tdatAuthorCd ,b.tdatDefaultNy ,c.path ,c.uuidName ,c.pseq ,c.type FROM tradItem a LEFT JOIN tradAuthor b ON b.tditSeq = a.tditSeq LEFT JOIN tradItemUploaded c ON c.pseq= a.tditSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.tdatDefaultNy = 1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditPublisherCd ,a.tditPublishingDate ,a.tditPrice ,a.tditDiscountCd ,a.tditDiscountRate ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditItemCate2 ,a.tditIsbn ,a.tditPage ,a.tditSize ,a.tditWeight ,a.tditBookDesc ,a.tditBookDesc2 ,a.tditTableOfContents ,a.tditDelNy FROM tradItem a WHERE 1=1 AND a.tditSeq = #{tditSeq}
SELECT tdatSeq ,tdatAuthorCd ,tdatTranslatorCd ,tdatDefaultNy ,tdatDelNy ,tditSeq FROM tradAuthor WHERE 1=1 AND tdatDelNy = 0 AND tditSeq = #{tditSeq}
SELECT seq , type , defaultNy , sort , originalName , uuidName , ext , size , delNy , pseq , path FROM tradItemUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND pseq = #{tditSeq}
SELECT tdkwSeq ,tdkwKeyword ,tdkwOrder ,tdkwDefaultNy ,tditSeq FROM tradItemKeyword WHERE 1=1 AND tditSeq = #{tditSeq}
